qr_instructions.title: How to Get Your QR Code
qr_instructions.subtitle: Follow these steps to get your SEQTA mobile app QR code
qr_instructions.step1_desc: Go to your school's SEQTA URL (e.g., yourschool.seqta.com.au) and log in with your usual credentials.
qr_instructions.step2_desc: Once logged in, look for the Settings section. This is usually found on the left sidebar.
qr_instructions.step3_desc: Find and click the "Connect Mobile App" or "Mobile Device" option. This will initiate the mobile app connection process.
qr_instructions.step4_desc: SEQTA will send an email to your registered school email address. This email contains the QR code you need for DesQTA.
qr_instructions.step4_note: The email might take a few minutes to arrive. Check your spam/junk folder if you don't see it.
qr_instructions.step5_title: Screenshot or Save the QR Code
qr_instructions.step5_desc: Open the email and take a screenshot of the QR code, or save the QR code image to your device.
qr_instructions.step5_desktop: Right-click the QR code → "Save image as..."
qr_instructions.step5_mobile: Long press the QR code → "Save to Photos" or take a screenshot
qr_instructions.step6_desc: Return to DesQTA and use the "Upload QR Code" button to select and upload your saved QR code image. DesQTA will automatically log you in!
qr_instructions.help_desc: If you can't find the "Connect Mobile App" option, it might be called something different at your school, such as:
qr_instructions.help_contact: Contact your school's IT support if you still can't locate this option.
